item.title: Deleting empty folders in Outlook
item.description: A friend of mine called me, and asked me for help… He had had a migration go wrong and had ended up with a bunch of .pst files containing 1000’s of emtpy folders. He had started cleaning up the .pst’s manually, after having spent several hours on one .pst file he decided on another approach, and this is where I came in. He asked if it was possible to write a script that would delete all the empty folders for him, I said to him that I bet it is possible, just not sure if I can do it, I have never really “scripted” Outlook before.
